refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes 6-channel audio data to an external device or stream.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Writes 6-channel audio data to an external device or stream.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: outh asig1, asig2, asig3, asig4, asig5, asig6

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Sends 6-channel audio samples to an accumulating output buffer (created at the beginning of performance) which serves to collect the output of all active instruments before the sound is written to disk. There can be any number of these output units in an instrument.
The type (mono, stereo, quad, hex, or oct) should agree with nchnls. But as of version 3.50, Csound will attempt to change an incorrect opcode to agree with nchnls statement.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: out, outo, outq, outq1, outq2, outq3, outq4, outs, outs1, outs2, soundout
